lead_paragraph: KENNY--Betty (Elizabeth S.), of Copiague, NY. She died peacefully at home on February 20, 2016. She was 67 years old. Betty was widely known and admired for her management skills in the health care field throughout the metropolitan area. She is survived by her brother, Edward Kenny, of Mineola, NY. She also leaves her best friends, Maura Halligan (Alan Reisman), Jean Pollack (Bob), Carol Harron (Billy), and their extended families. No funeral. However, as per her request, friends and colleagues will gather to celebrate her intelligence, humor, and love of life on Great South Bay later this Spring. It might get rowdy. She would approve. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KENNY, BETTY (ELIZABETH S.)
